name: Solfles
description:
Solfes! is a game about NOT being alone. 
Search for your Friends and bring them Home!

please download the game :)

the webGL doesnt work. will reupload after the GameJam (rules!).
sadly we are missing some sounds due to lack of time.

controls: WASD

win-condition: bring your friends home alive

This game was made for the #BrackeysGJ2022  by 2 friends. 

Theme: You are not Alone.

Thanks for reading :)
